metadata.description: Curated AI agent plugins for Claude Code and compatible agents

plugins.name: grepika
plugins.description: Token-efficient codebase exploration using grepika MCP server with trigram indexing, FTS5 search, and semantic file discovery.

plugins.name: humanika
plugins.description: Detect and fix AI writing patterns to make text sound like it was written by a real person with opinions, personality, and specific knowledge.

plugins.name: jj
plugins.description: JJ (Jujutsu) version control workflows for AI agentic development with Git colocation, parallel workspaces, and conflict resolution.
